result.eng: He should be expelled from the country.
result.ga: ba chóir é a ruaigeadh as an tír
result.orig: ba chóir é a ruaigeadh as an tír
result.html: ba chóir é a ruaigeadh as an tírHe should be expelled from the country.
result.ponchtml: ba ċóir é a ruaigeaḋ as an tírHe should be expelled from the country.

result.eng: They cannot be expelled, except in very limited circumstances.
result.ga: ní féidir iad a dhíbirt ach amháin i gcúinsí an-srianta
result.orig: ní féidir iad a dhíbirt ach amháin i gcúinsí an-srianta
result.html: ní féidir iad a dhíbirt ach amháin i gcúinsí an-sriantaThey cannot be expelled, except in very limited circumstances.
result.ponchtml: ní féidir iad a ḋíbirt aċ aṁáin i gcúinsí an-sriantaThey cannot be expelled, except in very limited circumstances.

result.eng: This is why the Lord expelled him from the garden of Eden.
result.ga: uime sin dhíbir an tiarna as gairdín Éidin é
result.orig: uime sin dhíbir an tiarna as gairdín Éidin é
result.html: uime sin dhíbir an tiarna as gairdín Éidin éThis is why the Lord expelled him from the garden of Eden.
result.ponchtml: uime sin ḋíbir an tiarna as gairdín Éidin éThis is why the Lord expelled him from the garden of Eden.
